amendment.description: To provide for leasing on the outer Continental Shelf and the distribution of certain qualified revenues from such leasing.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 102 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 102 proposed by Senator Tillis to Amendment SA 2. (consideration: CR S521-523, S525; text: CR S522) To provide for leasing on the outer Continental Shelf and the distribution of certain qualified revenues from such leasing.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 102 proposed by Senator Tillis to Amendment SA 2.
